#000;width:100%;padding-left:10px}@media(min-width:951px){.sf-cookie-policy{position:static;border:none}}.sf-cookie-policy--open{display:block}.sf-cookie-policy__message{color:#000;font-size:13px;line-height:18px;letter-spacing:.1px;display:inline-block;width:85%;max-width:800px;text-align:left;vertical-align:middle}.sf-cookie-policy__link{font-size:14px;color:#999;border-bottom:1px
